terraform.tfvars
files.content:
project_name = "bluegreen-rollout"
environment  = "dev"
aws_region   = "us-east-1"

# If you have an ACM cert and want HTTPS:
# enable_https        = true
# acm_certificate_arn = "arn:aws:acm:us-east-1:123456789012:certificate/xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx"

# Optional protections:
# enable_waf = true

# Optional CodeDeploy blue/green resources (requires CodeDeploy-based deployments):
# enable_codedeploy_bluegreen = true

# If you want to deploy a specific image tag:
# container_image = "123456789012.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/bluegreen-rollout-dev-app:latest"
